name: LEEWARD Episode 1
description:
A little girl named Wendy Fisher, from a fishers family, will be involved in an adventure in the four seas looking for her missing father, that's sound generic... but so it will be... she will bump with quirky and colorful characters with various personalities and lives, who try to help her or not in her adventure. Help Wendy in her crossing solving puzzles, dilemmas, problems, making friends or enemies and much more. or that's what we have to say to make it sound interesting. An adventure full of black and absurd humor, strange places, like its inhabitants  A game that is inspired by those graphic adventures of yesteryear and the popular culture  

The map above shows the locations Wendy will travel to finding their father during Leeward Episode 1

    

Leeward Episode 1 is the debut game of Lautaro Joaquin Esteras and Franco Tomas Esteras 🎮

The game will be divided into 3 episodes 🕹

Episode 1 has an approximate duration of between 3 to 4 hours 🕗

Hi there mortals of the world!. We are a huge dev team... we are so huge!, if two people is consider as a huge team...😒

We got a dream... the dream that every game developer has or thinks that is a game developer....

Build Our Own Theme Park With Blackjack and Hookers...

😬Oh... Sorry Dudes, Well... 

What was I talking about?🤔, Oh Yeah, about us... hmmm. idk, we can say that...hmm we have been developing Leeward for over a year(by the time you read this, I'm sure more time will have passed!). we have experienced many things in this adventure, and like crazy people we got into it without thinking about it. things have happened out of our hands, which made us divide the game into three episodes, it is not to our liking, but the third world wanted it to happen. we hope this is the beginning of a long (hopefully) history, and that our games will be to your liking. and those to come, if the god of programming and money help 🙄...

Find us and Leeward on these platforms:
